duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform installations and changes of broadband service, adhering to relevant codes, guidelines, and safety practices to ensure outstanding customer experience.
Troubleshoot and problem solve customer inquiries, ensuring proper functioning of products and services.
Use installation tools, hand tools, and perform jobs from high places, while adhering to safety procedures at all times.
Maintain proper equipment and vehicle, driving in a safe and responsible manner with appropriate licensing requirements.
Training will be provided in safety, installation, and other relevant areas as necessary.
